metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Sunday has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension and below-average scores in Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Sunday is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
